# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| v3.7.x     | :white_check_mark: |
| < v3.0.1   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Create an Issue and put the label `[security]` in the title of the issue.
Valid reported security issues are expected to be solved within a week.
